commit.message:
targhooks.c (default_stack_protect_guard): Avoid sharing RTL for __stack_chk_guard.

	* targhooks.c (default_stack_protect_guard): Avoid sharing RTL
	for __stack_chk_guard.

	* gcc.target/m68k/20100512-1.c: New.

From-SVN: r159310
